info.description:
A complete REST API for managing multiple WhatsApp sessions using Go, Fiber, PostgreSQL, and whatsmeow library.

## Authentication
All API endpoints (except /health and /swagger/*) require API key authentication.
Provide your API key in the `Authorization` header.
info.title: zpwoot - WhatsApp Multi-Session API

post.description: Creates a new Chatwoot integration configuration. This enables synchronization between Wameow and Chatwoot. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Creates a new Wameow session with the provided configuration. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Wameow sessions with optional filtering. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Establishes connection with Wameow for the specified session. Will generate QR code if not paired. You can use either the session UUID or session name. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

delete.description: Permanently removes a Wameow session and all associated data. This action cannot be undone. You can use either the session UUID or session name. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Wameow session including connection status and device info. You can use either the session UUID or session name. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Logs out from Wameow for the specified session. You can use either the session UUID or session name. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

Send presence information (typing, online, etc.)
Send a reaction (emoji) to a specific message
Send a sticker message through WhatsApp

Send a video message through WhatsApp
Send a simple text message through WhatsApp

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

404.description: Session not found or no QR code available

get.description: Retrieves the current webhook configuration for a specific session. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

404.description: Session or webhook configuration not found

post.description: Creates a new webhook configuration for a specific session. Webhooks will receive real-time events from Wameow. Requires API key authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

ApiKeyAuth.description: Enter your API key directly (no Bearer prefix required). Example: dev-api-key-12345
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
